result.execSummary:
The defendant Jason D. REPPEN was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jason D. REPPEN

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Judgment of Conviction Fine and Costs.

State files an Amended Information charging misdemeanor bail jumping, contrary to Section 946.49(1)(a) of the Wisconsin Statutes.  
No contest plea to the amended charge.  Convicted.  $100.00 fine, plus costs imposed, total of $379.00, to be paid by 04-13-15 or 7 days jail.  
Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights.  
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief.  
Minutes.
Letter from Attorney Skyberg to JA Marcelle.
Pretrial conference is reset to 02-13-15 at 10:00 a.m.
for Adjournment from Public Defenders office.

Adjournment of PTC from 01-30-2015 to 02-13-2015 @ 2:00 p.m. BR-1 
and Jury Trial from 02-05-2015 to 02-17-2015@ 8:30 a.m. #2, BR-1.

No agreement.  
Jury trial set for 02-05-15 at 8:30 a.m. Position No. 1
Pre-trial conference set for 01-30-15 at 8:30 a.m.
Minutes
Plea Date scheduled for 11-18-2014 @ 8:30 a.m. BR-1.
Notice of Motion; Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.

Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 1 for further proceedings.  Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing. 
ARRAIGNMENT
Information filed.  Not guilty plea.  Jury Calendar.  Settlement conference with the District Attorney is set for 08-19-14 at 2:00 p.m.    
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.  
Minutes.

Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.  Preliminary hearing is set for 07-16-14 at 1:30 p.m.  
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of bail jumping.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 07-07-14 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $1,000.00 recognizance bond.   Bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.
Probable Cause Statement and Judicial Determination.
Minutes.
